translations: 国王的；高贵的，国王似的

sentences.sentence: They thought that he should resume his kingly duties.
sentences.translation: 他们认为他应该继续履行君主的职责。

sentences.sentence: Down on your marrow bones, all of ye, and do reverence to his kingly port and royal rags!
sentences.translation: 你们这些人都快下跪吧，所有人，向他高贵的举止和衣衫致敬吧！

sentences.sentence: Tom experienced a glow of pride and a renewed sense of the compensating advantages of the kingly office.
sentences.translation: 汤姆感受到一种强烈的自豪感，也重新体会到做国王所带来的好处。
